short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View image button for google image search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add View Image in new tab functionality to Google image search results.
This works on all the google websites.
In the mid of 2018, Google removed View Image button, This extension let you bring back the view image button in the chrome. Just click on the View Image button on the top right hand side of the image to view the image in a new tab.
